name: Farino The Marino
description:
CONTROLS:

  • A: Go to right
  • D: Go to left
  • Space: Jump
  • Hold Shift + A or D to Run
  • Mouse left click: Fire (with fireball powerup)

NOTE: Remember to play on Fullscreen :)

This is a SMB Level 1-1 clone I made for practice and portfolio in Unity engine.

It was treated as a real game, since all game structures are in the project, meaning I can build my own levels and expand from this project (but won't, I started working on something else after finishing this). Any comments will be appretiated :)

All the programming, graphics and animations were done by David Fuentes (It's me! *with Mario voice*).

Level design and gameplay mechanics were designed by Nintendo for Super Mario Bros on NES, I just replicated them.

All sounds (music and effects) were taken from SoundCloud, from these very talented users:

  • Irish Party Part 2 (Blue Temperature)
  • With the Irish wind (youmi)
  • Retro Video Game Sound Effects Pack Preview (Juhani Junkala)
  • Heroic Epic Orchestral Adventure (Sound Gallery by Dmitry Taras)
  • Raid_FolkMetal (PeriTune)
  • another game music - The Quiet Cave (southcross)

Source code is available in my GitHub repository, for given access, let me know :)
